# ipam_pool (Data Source)

IPAM pool data source for managing IP address ranges



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the IP pool

### Read-Only

- `cidrs` (List of String) CIDR blocks in the pool
